ProjectTitle: An innovative approach to unravel the role of soil colloids and nanofertilisers on the bioavailability of phosphorus in highly weathered soils
InitialFeedbackHistory:
20/01/2025
Can you please specify the origin of the soil and plant samples? It is currently not clear where the research will be performed and/or whether material will be collected abroad and next analyzed at KU Leuven. Please also check whether the use of the plant material may fall under the Nagoya Protocol (https://research.kuleuven.be/en/associatienet/ethics/guidance/nagoya) or local ABS (Access and Benefit Sharing) legislation, in case material would be collected in Madagascar. For questions related to the Nagoya Protocol, please contact Wouter Vandevelde (wouter.vandevelde@kuleuven.be)
label: good with suggestions
